publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4906 Jamie Hepburn: Congratulations to Beautiful Scotland Awards Winners 2009—That the Parliament congratulates Cumbernauld Village on its award of a bronze medal certificate in the Urban Community Category of this year’s Beautiful Scotland Awards; further congratulates the communities of Condorrat, Caldercruix and Glenboig, which also received bronze medal certificates, and Kilsyth on its award for the best new entry in the same category; notes the hard work and dedication on the part of community bodies and representatives who have applied for the awards and helped decorate and maintain their areas to such an award-winning standard, and encourages local communities to continue developing their sense of civic pride and to keep Scotland and their local areas beautiful for years to come. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor*, Aileen Campbell*, Stuart McMillan*, Bob Doris*, Alasdair Allan*, Rob Gibson*, Liam McArthur*
